text:
[Verse]
Splash of puddles everywhere
Feel the rhythm in the air
Shoes are soaked but don't care
We're dancing like a dare

[Verse 2]
Thunder's rolling in the skies
Electric moments in our eyes
Let the raindrops harmonize
With our laughter and our sighs

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Every drop a pure delight
Under wet street lights so bright
We'll keep moving until daylight

[Verse 3]
Clothes are clinging to our skin
Every step a wild spin
Flowing free where dreams begin
Raindrop melodies within

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Every drop a pure delight
Under wet street lights so bright
We'll keep moving until daylight

[Bridge]
No need for a shelter now
The rain's our song
Take a bow
Let's surrender
Let's allow
Magic in each stormy wow
title: Dancing in the Rain
